summary: "Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows – Part 2" is the last movie in the Harry Potter series. Released in 2011, it's about Harry's mission to destroy Lord Voldemort's powerful objects. The film stars Daniel Radcliffe as Harry, along with his friends Ron and Hermione. It was a big hit, making over $1.3 billion and becoming one of the top-grossing films ever. It was praised for its exciting action, great effects, and strong performances. The movie and its DVD/Blu-ray releases also won many awards.
title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows – Part 2
